articles.author: Laura He, CNN Business
articles.title: China pumps $188 billion into the economy to counter real estate slump - CNN
articles.description: China has decided it's time to loosen its purse strings and pump money into the economy in a bid to stave off threats to the recovery.

articles.author: Michael Wayland
articles.title: Toyota to build $1.29 billion EV battery plant in North Carolina, create 1,750 jobs - CNBC
articles.description: Toyota expects the facility to be capable of producing enough lithium-ion batteries for 200,000 vehicles when production begins in 2025.
articles.content:
Toyota Motor will build a new $1.29 billion battery plant for electrified vehicles in North Carolina, the company announced Monday afternoon.
